trends: There has been one other sighting in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around July 4th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsWalked outside house around 230 Am on clear night and immdiately noticedflashing lights - obviously not a plane as it was basicly not moving. Looked atobject through binoculars and saw closeup of strange pulsating lightenergy soucethat occassionally changed colors. Observed object off and on for close tohalf-hour. Object began jumping around crazily and eventually moved out of sightover western sillouete of nearby Mountain. My first sighting.
